availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Anderson (Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of William Anderson and Kitty A. Anderson. Married to Thursey Anderson. Father of Elizabeth Anderson, Lucinda Anderson, Sallie A. Anderson, Alice Anderson, and Catherine Anderson. Farmer in Garrard County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard, District 1, p. 222A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard, Buckeye District 2, p. 8.
